remarks: Equality theorem for a length 7 word.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.)
statement:
s2eqd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A = N ) $.
s2eqd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B = O ) $.
s3eqd.3 $e |- ( ph -> C = P ) $.
s4eqd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D = Q ) $.
s5eqd.5 $e |- ( ph -> E = R ) $.
s6eqd.6 $e |- ( ph -> F = S ) $.
s7eqd.6 $e |- ( ph -> G = T ) $.
s7eqd $p |- ( ph -> <" A B C D E F G "> = <" N O P Q R S T "> ) $.
